Posts.EditableText:
Just a small suggestion, nothing important at all, but a bio section in our profiles would be pretty cool.

We could let everyone know whether they should refer to us as 'he' or 'she', if nothing else.

Posts.EditableText: I guess so. I'd rather prefer seeing what types of games they favor, since this is a gaming website and all.
